description: I'm a software engineer, Bitcoin and FOSS supporter, currently I've been working on a [p2p lightning network telegram bot](https://github.com/grunch/p2plnbot) and a [A CLI descriptor-based wallet](https://github.com/BlockchainCommons/mori-cli) to be used to safely inherit bitcoin, but my main goal now is to contribute to the [RGB](https://www.rgbfaq.com) project.
